title: x/crypto/ssh: support curve25519-sha256@libssh.org and diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256
body:
Please add support for the following key exchange methods recommended as most secure at various places around the web:
curve25519-sha256@libssh.org
diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256

This is causing me grief as it is for the reporter of the following bug:
https://github.com/shazow/ssh-chat/issues/113
